title: Pets are welcome at East Perimeter Pointe Apartments! 1 bd / 1 ba. Call for tour
posting_body: ['East Perimeter Pointe Apartments', '4946 Snapfinger Woods Dr.', 'Decatur, GA 30035', 'show contact info', 'Unit Information:', '1 Bedroom | 1 Bath', 'Unit Size:', '619 - 636 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent:', '$1124', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month', 'Unit Includes:', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Custom Paint Tone', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Dishwasher', '➢ Garbage Disposal', '➢ Island Kitchens', '➢ Linen Closet', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Fully Equipped Kitchens w/Frost-Free Refrigerator', '➢ Hardwood Flooring', '➢ Newly Renovated Apartments', '➢ Patio or Balcony Options', '➢ Roommate Floor Plans', '➢ Townhomes Available', '➢ Upgraded Lighting Package', 'Property Description:', "The living spaces at East Perimeter Pointe are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Decatur, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near East Perimeter Pointe.", "You'll love living in the Decatur location!", 'Property Amenities:', '➢ Common Area Wi-Fi', '➢ Community Events', '➢ Green Community', '➢ Indoor Pool', '➢ Laundry Facilities', '➢ On-Site Maintenance', '➢ Outdoor Area', '➢ Playground', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Valet Trash', '➢ Electronic Rent Payment', '➢ Gazebo & Grilling Areas', '➢ Monthly Resident Events', '➢ On-site Maintenance Management', '➢ Preferred Employer Discounts Available', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Racquetball Court(s)', '➢ Resident Referral Bonuses', '➢ Trail, Bike, Hike, Jog', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Call us today!', 'show contact info', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pet Ownership Policy:', 'A maximum of 2 pet per unit shall be accepted.', 'The pet fee is $300 Non-Refundable per pet.', 'A pet addendum must be completed and pet fees must be paid prior to moving in.', 'If there is more than one pet per unit, the combined weight of the 2 pets cannot exceed 50lbs.', 'For more information, please call our leasing office.', 'Proudly managed by Ventron Management', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'DE2F7F100D004448']
